basics.name: Henry Ndirangu
basics.label:
I am an astute Communications Professional with experience spanning over 16 years in journalism and Public Relations.

I leverage existing and emerging technologies to design Integrated Communication campaigns that impact positively on the intended internal and external publics.

My experience and exposure working with leading organisations and brands, coupled with continuous learning, has shaped me into  a versatile communications consultant playing a strategic role in the attainment of each of the organisations goals, objectives and aspirations.

Specialties: Communication Strategy formulation and implementation, Media Relations, Media Training for our clients, Corporate Social Investment and Sponsorship, Crisis and Issues Management, Editorial Development, Social Media and Public Affairs.

work.company: Ogilvy Public Relations Worldwide, Nairobi, Kenya
work.desc: I work with a team of highly skilled and dedicated individuals in strategic communications planning, execution and evaluation for our blue chip clients. Other roles include giving proactive counsel on regulatory, political, environmental and economic matters that have a bearing on the business objectives of our respective clients.
Communication Strategy formulation and implementation, Media Relations, Training, Corporate Social Investment and Sponsorship, Crisis and Issues Management, Editorial Development, Public Affairs
As News Editor i was in charge of the breakfast news output on five radio stations- three of them the most popular in their categories.

I was in charge of the daily news output on 5 radio stations among them category leaders; Kiss 100, Classic 105 and East FM. This entailed offering leadership to a team of reporters, producers and news anchors to ensure that we present the best news package for the distinct listeners at the right time and in the most suitable treatment of news stories.
